param.name: templatefilter
param.description: possible values are "featured", "self", "self-executable", "executable", and "community".* featured-templates that are featured and are public* self-templates that have been registered/created by the owner* selfexecutable-templates that have been registered/created by the owner that can be used to deploy a new VM* executable-all templates that can be used to deploy a new VM* community-templates that are public.

param.name: account
param.description: list template by account. Must be used with the domainId parameter.

param.name: domainid
param.description: list all templates in specified domain. If used with the account parameter, lists all templates for an account in the specified domain.

param.name: hypervisor
param.description: the hypervisor for which to restrict the search

response.name: id
response.description: the template ID

response.name: account
response.description: the account name to which the template belongs

response.name: accountid
response.description: the account id to which the template belongs

response.name: bootable
response.description: true if the ISO is bootable, false otherwise

response.name: checksum
response.description: checksum of the template

response.name: created
response.description: the date this template was created

response.name: crossZones
response.description: true if the template is managed across all Zones, false otherwise

response.name: displaytext
response.description: the template display text

response.name: domain
response.description: the name of the domain to which the template belongs

response.name: domainid
response.description: the id of the domain to which the template belongs

response.name: format
response.description: the format of the template.

response.name: hostid
response.description: the ID of the secondary storage host for the template

response.name: hostname
response.description: the name of the secondary storage host for the template

response.name: hypervisor
response.description: the hypervisor on which the template runs

response.name: isextractable
response.description: true if the template is extractable, false otherwise

response.name: isfeatured
response.description: true if this template is a featured template, false otherwise

response.name: ispublic
response.description: true if this template is a public template, false otherwise

response.name: isready
response.description: true if the template is ready to be deployed from, false otherwise.

response.name: jobid
response.description: shows the current pending asynchronous job ID. This tag is not returned if no current pending jobs are acting on the virtual machine

response.name: jobstatus
response.description: shows the current pending asynchronous job status

response.name: name
response.description: the template name

response.name: ostypeid
response.description: the ID of the OS type for this template.

response.name: ostypename
response.description: the name of the OS type for this template.

response.name: passwordenabled
response.description: true if the reset password feature is enabled, false otherwise

response.name: removed
response.description: the date this template was removed

response.name: size
response.description: the size of the template

response.name: sourcetemplateid
response.description: the template ID of the parent template if present

response.name: status
response.description: the status of the template

response.name: templatetag
response.description: the tag of this template

response.name: templatetype
response.description: the type of this template

response.name: zoneid
response.description: the ID of the zone for this template

response.name: zonename
response.description: the name of the zone for this template
